general.maintenanceModeDescription: We are currently updating this site. Please check back later.

notice.VIOLATION::CUSTOMER_EMAIL_NOT_UNIQUE: This email address has already been registered.
notice.FRAMEWORK__INVALID_UUID: The selected payment method does not exist.
notice.addToCartError: An error occurred while trying to add items to the shopping cart.
notice.product-not-found: The product could not be found.
notice.message-403: Your session has expired. Please return to the last page and try again.
notice.product-out-of-stock: Product is not available at the moment.
notice.product-stock-reached: The product "{name}" is only available {quantity} times
notice.purchase-steps-quantity: The product "{name}" is not available in this quantity. The quantity was changed to {quantity}
notice.shipping-method-blocked: The shipping method "{name}" is blocked for your current shopping cart.
notice.payment-method-blocked: The payment method "{name}" is blocked for your current shopping cart.
notice.promotion-excluded: One or more discounts have been removed from the shopping cart, due to conflicts with other discounts. Once the conditions are met again, the discounts will be applied automatically.
notice.promotion-not-eligible: Promotion code valid - however, not all conditions were met and the discount was not applied. Once all conditions are met, the discount will be applied automatically.
notice.promotion-not-found: Promotion with code "{promotionCode}" could not be found.
notice.shipping-address-blocked: Shipping to the selected shipping address is currently not possible.
notice.billing-address-blocked: Billing to the selected address is not possible.
notice.shipping-address-invalid: The selected shipping address is not valid or incomplete. Please check your entries.
notice.billing-address-invalid: The selected billing address is not valid or incomplete. Please check your entries.
notice.cart-merged-hint: The current shopping cart might contain additional products that have been added and saved during a previous visit.
notice.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
notice.loginBadCredentials: Could not find an account that matches the given credentials.
notice.inactiveAccountAlert: Your customer account has not been activated yet. We have sent a confirmation email containing an activation link. Please check your inbox and click the link to complete the sign-up!

app.not-in-sync: Unfortunately the session expired, you will need to log back in.
